page.title: 09Ruins of Inchnadamph.
page.content: {Ardvreck Castle}was built in the{1590s by{Donald Ban Macleod.Macleods}were always fueding. The first Macleod was {Leod,a Norseman. Torquil owned Lewis {and Assynt.Later,Neil Macleod}arrested the{Duke of Montrose,}when he fled after the battle of{Carbisdale(1650).A legend tells how{Mackenzies of Kintail lured Macleods to a banquet at sea, tied them up and cut their heads off! {Calda House}was built by{John Mac- {kenzie,}the 2nd son of the 3rd Lord Seaforth, in{1688(approx).}By 1736,his son, Kenneth, was badly in debt and he and his wife,Frances tried to mortgage Assynt to the{Sutherlands and Lord {Seaforth.}Both succeeded!The following dispute of ownership led to Calda House being destroyed by fire about {1737.}It was foretold by the Brahan Seer that Calda will fall down during a shoot! Both were fenced this year.
